p: Azadirachtin is the secondary metabolite of Indian neem ( Azadirachta indica). In a single report, while the neem leaves extract showed inhibition of dengue virus (DNV) replication, the pure azadirachtin did not reveal any inhibitory effect in vitro and in vivo ( Parida et al., 2002). In this report we demonstrated the novel anti-HBV activity of azadirachtin. Our docking study showed interaction of azadiractin with HBV Pol through Glu1, Pro5, His156, Ser117, Arg120 and Arg153, resulting in a stable azadiractin-Pol complex with a free energy of −8.1 kcal/mol.
